title: Goldman Seeing 'Resurgence of Interest' for Crypto Options From Hedge Fund Clients: Bloomberg
description: The approval of spot bitcoin ETFs in the U.S. in January brought about a pickup in interest from Goldman's existing clients.

title: Last week’s market correction spurred $942 million outflow from investment products
description:
Crypto-related investment products experienced a downturn after a streak of record inflows, with a total outflow of $942 million reported last week, according to CoinShares‘ latest weekly report. This marks the first instance of outflows in the past eight weeks, signaling the conclusion of an impressive seven-week inflow totaling $12.3 billion. Market correction impacts crypto […]

The post Last week’s market correction spurred $942 million outflow from investment products appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Solana and Avalanche Bounce Back; Algotechs 100x Stuns Investors
description: The world of cryptocurrency is a hive of activity, buzzing with the energy of traders on the lookout for the next big opportunity. It's a realm filled with intriguing possibilities for those daring enough to explore beyond the conventional boundaries.

title: AI’s Dual Role in Cybersecurity: Challenges and Opportunities
description: In the rapidly evolving cybersecurity landscape, the emergence of artificial intelligence (AI) has become a pivotal force, presenting both formidable challenges and unprecedented opportunities. title: Singapore is About to Become an AI Superpower
description: Singapore has continued to quietly take strategic steps towards becoming a global leader in artificial intelligence.  Last month, the city-state announced a plan to invest more than $743 million (S$1 billion) into AI developments, and today, it has launched an AI institute, which is paramount to synergising and spearheading AI research and innovation across different […]

title: Binance seeking for new buyer for its business in Russia, following CommEX’s closure
description: Cryptocurrency exchange Binance is talking with several platforms about selling its Russian business and is looking for a new buyer to replace CommEX.

title: Final Stretch: Binance vs. SEC Legal Duel Draws to Conclusion
description:
In the final stages of a lengthy legal battle, crypto firm Binance faces off against the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). With the discovery phase nearing completion, both parties are preparing for the last lap of this high-stakes confrontation.
